Tai Cai | Home

I am a Data Scientist on the Global Intelligence team at Uber, working on marketplace intelligence for Uber Eats. Prior to my current role, I worked on the Data and Research team at BitSight. I have a PhD in Biostatistics from Harvard University, and a Bachelor of Mathematics from the University of Waterloo.

This site contains various projects I enjoy working on during my spare time. Some of these are applied problems motivated by interesting data, while others are driven by curiosity about a particular concept.

Thanks for visiting! Send me an email if you would like to talk.
